summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Weed and Seed Program in the East Precinct; authorizing the execution of agreements with the United States Department of Justice and the United States Department of Justice, Federal Bureau of Investigation, for financial assistance in the amount of Two Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars ($250,000) for continuation of the Weed and Seed Program in the East Precinct; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1998 Budgets of the Police Department, the Department of Housing and Human Services, and the Health Department; ratifying and confirming prior acts; and making a reimbursable appropriation therefor; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
